casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Calvin B. ALFORD, Appellant. No. ED 106769 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION ONE. Filed: July 16, 2019 David L. Bryant, Adam A. Field, Co-Counsel, 2200 N. Hwy 67, #396, Florissant, Mo. 63032, 222 S. Central Ave, Suite 110, St. Louis, Mo. 63105, for appellant. Richard A. Starnes, P.O. Box 899, Jefferson City, MO. 65102, for respondent. Before Roy L. Richter, P.J., Robert M. Clayton, III, J., and Angela T. Quigless, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Calvin B. Alford appeals the judgment entered on a jury verdict finding him guilty of second-degree assault, Section 565.060 RSMo (2000). No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. We have, however, furnished the parties with a memorandum, for their information only, setting forth the reasons for our decision. We affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
